title: The Next
description: Romantic Suspense. Often summarized as The Gay Rear Window, but that's just the jumping off point. A romance springs to life as two men merge with a common to catch a killer they suspect occupies one of the apartments across the courtyard. But their romance must hurdle the main protagonist's strangling unresolved demons as well as imminent life threatening danger. But if they make it through, they can both bring life back to their lives. The Next romances Love, Alfred Hitchcock, and New York City in large, creamy dollops.
author: Rafe Haze
